constraints.paper_doi_unique: CREATE CONSTRAINT paper_doi IF NOT EXISTS FOR (p:Paper) REQUIRE p.doi IS UNIQUE
constraints.year_unique: CREATE CONSTRAINT year_unique IF NOT EXISTS FOR (y:Year) REQUIRE y.year IS UNIQUE

queries.all_papers: MATCH (p:Paper) RETURN p.doi as doi, p.title as title, p.abstract as abstract, toString(p.date) as date ORDER BY p.date DESC LIMIT 100
queries.multi_search_template: MATCH (p:Paper) WHERE {search_conditions} RETURN p.doi as doi, p.title as title, p.abstract as abstract, toString(p.date) as date ORDER BY p.date DESC LIMIT 50

prompts.qa_template:
You are a concise research assistant.
Use the provided context (paper titles/abstracts) to answer the user question.
Cite the DOIs of the most relevant papers at the end under "Sources".
If unsure, say you are unsure.

Question:
{question}

Context:
{context}
